name: Android Key Layout File
summary: A KL file is a key layout map that connects keyboard input on an Android device to actions in Android. It stores key definitions in UTF-8 text, which include the SCANCODE (the key number preceded by key ), KEYCODE (the action the key is mapped to), and FLAGS (additional functionality associated with the key, like waking the device). KL files also include comments denoted by the pound character ( # )

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: KL file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.62
